    <category citation-format="author-date"/>

  </info>

    <layout delimiter="; ">
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <choose>
          <if page="page" match="none">
            <label form="symbol" variable="page"/>
          </if>
        </choose>
        <number variable="page"/>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
